common: Set / Get / delete object properties/ methods

ExecutionContext: ways to bind this to the function

classes: Private and protected properties and methods

render: Why and how do we use ReactDOM library
jsxLessReact: Why do we import react if we don't use it
Note: question is about old react version (before 17th version)

fiber: Explain how this algorithm works in own words
jobs: A basic understanding of how prioritization works in react

functionalComponents: Know and understand at a basic level what functional components are for
How to work with state in functional components
classComponents: Ability to write a class component
props: how to organize reverse data flow to parent
state: Working with state in class and functional components
Basic understanding of how setState works
lifecycleMethods: some lifecycle methods, maybe from class components?
propsValidation: How runtime typing works in react
portals: Understanding and being able to explain in your own words what portals are used for in react

jsxHandlers: Understanding and being able to explain the difference between native handlers and handlers in react
binding: Understanding and the ability to explain how to not to lose context, etc.
syntheticEvent: What is SynteticEvent and what is it for
eventTypes: What are the types of events in react
controlledComponents: What is the difference between controlled and uncontrolled components
Ability to explain the essence in your own words

testingTools: What are jest and enzyme for
testingTypes: basic understanding of snapshot testing, why it can be used

reactRouter: Knows how to work with react-router
reactRouterApi: basic understanding of API components: Route, Switch, Link

reduxMainPrinciples: Understand and be able to explain in detail what Redux is for
What entities are used in it
HOCconnect: What role does it play in the application architecture
Know and be able to tell about this HOC
action: Confident understanding of actions as an entity
reducers: Basic understanding of the work of a reducer: what basic rules it must comply with
reduxForm: How redux-forms works in react+redux ecosystem

whyHooks: the ability to explain the benefits of hooks in your own words
useEffect: Understanding what lifecycle methods this hook can replace
What is the second argument for
stateHooks: Ability to work with basic hooks
Explain in your own words how useState and useReducer work
